```lisp
[
  '(:action swing
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - item)
    :precondition (and (beside ?agent ?item) (not (engaged ?agent ?item)))
    :effect (and (engaged ?agent ?item) (not (beside ?agent ?item))))',

  '(:action put
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - item ?target - item)
    :precondition (and (not (in_state ?item ?target)) (available ?agent))
    :effect (in_state ?item ?target))',

  '(:action hold
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - item)
    :precondition (and (between_legs ?agent ?item) (not (holding ?agent ?item)))
    :effect (holding ?agent ?item))',

  '(:action pedal
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?vehicle - vehicle ?pedal - item)
    :precondition (and (foot_on_pedal ?agent ?pedal) (holding_handlebars ?agent ?vehicle) (not (pedaling ?agent)))
    :effect (and (pedaling ?agent) (moving ?vehicle)))',

  '(:action stop
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?target - item ?tool - item)
    :precondition (and (active ?agent) (engaged ?agent ?target) (using ?agent ?tool))
    :effect (not (active ?agent)))'
]
```
